TopicTitle: Dad builds interactive spaceship for his kids

Articles.Content: I love how thoughtful he was to include a reaction thruster on the outside. I just hope the dad will teach the kids about real-world spaceflight and astronomy, would be a shame if he didn't.

I love how thoughtful he was to include a reaction thruster on the outside. I just hope the dad will teach the kids about real-world spaceflight and astronomy, would be a shame if he didn't.

Did you see he even has mission control and a simulated Main B Bus undervolt explosion for from Apollo 13? This dad rules
